Class FlightBoard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.softeng.is25am10.model.boards.FlightBoard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class FlightBoard extends Object implements Serializable
The board used by all the players, manages everything done on the flight board in the physical game. Includes methods for moving pawns
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

    Class
    Description
    static enum 
    FlightBoard.Pawn
    Enumerates the different rocket pawns which can be used by the player.

  • Constructor Details

    • FlightBoard

      public FlightBoard()

  • Method Details

    • setRocketReady

      public void setRocketReady(FlightBoard.Pawn pawn)
      Method used to add the rocket pawn on the flight board by finishing order
      Parameters:
      pawn - The pawn to be added

    • moveTimer

      public void moveTimer()
      Flips the hourglass. This can be done by players only after the time from the previous flip has run out.

    • moveRocket

      public void moveRocket(FlightBoard.Pawn pawn, int pos)
      Method for moving the rocket pawn in a new position, moves the pawn to the position pos while accounting for the order of the pawns and for a possible overtaking of other pawns.
      Parameters:
      pawn - the pawn to be moved.
      pos - the target position of the pawn. If overtaking happens pos is not the new position of the pawn pawn.

    • getTimer

      public int getTimer()
      Get method for the position of the hourglass.
      Returns:
      the number of flips done on the hourglass.

    • getOrder

      public List<FlightBoard.Pawn> getOrder()
      Get method for the order of the pawns on the flight board. The pawns are stored in an ordered list, their position on the list is their order on the flight board.
      Returns:
      list of the order of the pawns.

    • getOffset

      public List<Integer> getOffset()
      Get method for the relative distances between pawns on the flight board. It is used to account for overtaking and for pawns lapping their opponents.
      Returns:
      list of distances between each pawn and the leader.

    • getLeaderPosition

      public int getLeaderPosition()
      Get method for the absolute position of the leader on the flight board.
      Returns:
      leader position.

    • quit

      public void quit(FlightBoard.Pawn pawn)
      The player quits the game. It can be intentional by the player or an automatic decision from the model.
      Parameters:
      pawn - the player to quit

    • getQuitters

      public List<FlightBoard.Pawn> getQuitters()
      get the list of player quits

    • checkDuped

      public void checkDuped()
      check if the leader made a total lap over some player

      public boolean equals(Object o)
